title: Traces & Spans
description: Analyze distributed traces, critical paths, and resiliency anti-patterns.

title: Logs & Patterns
description: AI-powered log pattern extraction, anomaly detection, and before/after comparison.

title: Metrics & Burn Rate
description: Time-series analysis, SLO compliance, multi-window burn rate, and Golden Signals.

title: Changes & Deployments
description: Correlate incidents with recent deployments, config changes, and code commits.

title: Council Investigation
description: Five specialist panels analyze in parallel with optional debate-based consensus.

title: Root Cause Analysis
description: Multi-signal synthesis to identify what happened, what changed, and the blast radius.

title: Circuit Breakers
description: Three-state failure recovery protecting API quotas and preventing cascading failures.

title: Postmortems
description: Generate blameless incident reports with severity assessment and prioritized action items.

title: Remediation Suggestions
description: Pattern-matched fix suggestions ranked by risk and effort, with ready-to-run commands.

title: Incident Lifecycle
description: Five-phase investigation from triage to completion with quality scoring.

title: Security & Safety
description: Policy engine, tool access levels, EUC enforcement, and human approval workflows.

title: Adding Tools
description: Extend the agent with custom Python tools, MCP servers, and tool configuration.

title: The Brain
description: Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro: how the agent selects models for different tasks.

title: Data Sources
description: Cloud Trace, Logging, Monitoring, BigQuery, GKE, GitHub, and more.

title: Deployment Options
description: Local dev, Cloud Run, Vertex AI Agent Engine, and GKE deployment modes.

title: Fixing the Agent
description: Troubleshoot permissions, loops, MCP failures, and use the Agent Debugger.
